Taiwan alert says Chinese satellite flies over south Taiwan airspaceTaiwan authorities sent out an island-wide alert on Tuesday, saying a Chinese satellite had flown over south Taiwan airspace. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 07:50:38 GMT RZZMSS47GZKSDKZMLAI3GHTTZ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-alert-says-chinese-satellite-flies-over-south-taiwan-airspace-2024-01-09/Reuters世界亚太地区
Bridge dilemma captures divide over China in Taiwan electionsPointing at Xiamen's skyscrapers across the water from his office, Chen Tsang-chiang recalled how 30 years ago the southern Chinese city was as low-slung as his Taiwanese island of Kinmen. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 07:18:57 GMT NEL3Z6MTC5PZ5NDKDZAPCKVNXE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bridge-dilemma-captures-divide-over-china-taiwan-elections-2024-01-09/Sarah Wu世界亚太地区
Indonesia ready to work with countries to finalise South China Sea codeIndonesia's Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi said on Tuesday her country is ready to work with other Southeast Asian nations to finalise a long-delayed code of conduct for the South China Sea, where many of its neighbours have overlapping claims with China. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 06:55:08 GMT 3GOTV4NT25NETGL4PHEVWQD5MA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-ready-work-with-countries-finalizing-south-china-sea-code-2024-01-09/Reuters世界亚太地区
Weak economy, COVID rampage likely shrank China's population again in 2023China's population likely dropped for a second consecutive year in 2023 due to a surge in COVID-related deaths after the country abruptly ended strict lockdowns, while weak confidence in the economy's prospects keeps birth rates depressed. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 06:03:47 GMT XPVR74SOVRM4DC37FKIGJX4VOM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/weak-economy-covid-rampage-likely-shrank-chinas-population-again-2023-2024-01-09/Farah Master世界中国
Maldives president courts investors in China as Indian ties sagAt an "Invest Maldives" forum in a southern Chinese port city, Maldivian President Mohamed Muizzu shook hands and exchanged words with smiling local officials on a China visit set to deepen bilateral ties as the archipelagic nation pirouettes away from India. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 05:52:35 GMT ONXHILYXRROPFOYGJDNLRPYKMI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/maldives-president-courts-investors-china-ties-with-india-case-2024-01-09/Ryan Woo, Joe Cash世界亚太地区
Chinese EV giant BYD to launch cars in Indonesia next week - companyChina's BYD , the world's biggest seller of battery electric vehicles (BEVs), will launch its cars in Indonesia next week, the company said on Tuesday. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 05:28:31 GMT F6LZ4BQ2DVJYLHBKROG6WGHULM https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/chinese-ev-giant-to-launch-cars-indonesia-next-week-company-2024-01-09/Reuters商业带电
Cathay Pacific needs to address capacity issues, Hong Kong leader saysPlans by Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific Airways to slash flights during the busy Lunar New Year period show the airline needs to address its capacity problems, the city's leader said, while its pilot union called for a government enquiry. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 04:22:24 GMT 54P424FKBRKTNNCLTXAIXSYCOM https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/cathay-pacific-needs-address-capacity-issues-hong-kong-leader-says-2024-01-09/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
TikTok owner ByteDance in talks with Tencent, others to sell gaming assetsTikTok owner ByteDance said on Tuesday it is in talks with multiple prospective buyers of its gaming assets, including the world's largest video games company, Tencent , as the Chinese social media firm retreats from the gaming industry. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 02:54:29 GMT HGTEL6G3WFIRNLXPZUI2J7TFMQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/tiktok-owner-bytedance-talks-with-tencent-others-sell-gaming-assets-2024-01-09/Josh Ye市场交易
Taiwan ruling party candidate will maintain status quo, engage with ChinaTaiwan's ruling party presidential candidate Lai Ching-te said on Tuesday he would maintain the status quo and pursue peace through strength if elected, remaining open to engagement with Beijing under the preconditions of equality and dignity. Taiwan defence ministry says it saw four Chinese balloons over Taiwan StraitTaiwan's defence ministry said on Tuesday that it had spotted four Chinese balloons over the Taiwan Strait on Monday, two of which crossed Taiwan island. US Navy sailor given 27 months in jail for sharing military data with ChinaA U.S. Navy sailor was sentenced to 27 months in jail on Monday for accepting nearly $15,000 in bribes from a Chinese intelligence officer in exchange for photos of unclassified private U.S. military information. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 22:03:26 GMT RVYANAZ6MJKBJK2T35TRMJILCE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-navy-sailor-given-27-months-in-jail-sharing-military-data-with-china-2024-01-08/Reuters世界美国
